flawed_nl_solution:
His speed means he can do 10/100=<<10/100=0.1>>0.1 minute per piece
So he can finish 1 puzzle in 2000*0.1=<<2000*0.1=200>>200 minutes
So these two puzzles take 200*2=<<200*2=40>>40 minutes
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 40. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
